results.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
results.overview: Peter Parker's secret identity is revealed to the entire world. He turns to Doctor Strange for help.

results.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
results.overview: Doctor Strange faces a new threat that forces him to unleash a forbidden spell.

results.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
results.overview: Jake Sully and Ney'tiri have formed a family and are doing everything to stay together.

results.title: John Wick: Chapter 4
results.overview: With the price on his head ever increasing, John Wick takes his fight against the High Table global.

results.title: Fast X
results.overview: Dom Toretto and his family are targeted by the vengeful son of drug kingpin Hernan Reyes.

results.title: Dune
results.overview: Paul Atreides must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family.

results.title: Inception
results.overview: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given an inverse task.

results.title: The Dark Knight
results.overview: Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations that plague Gotham.

results.title: Interstellar
results.overview: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

results.title: Avengers: Endgame
results.overview: The Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.
